entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
